entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
